reviews.title: High Class Charmer
text: Great atmosphere, decorum and cocktails made from the distilleries own spirits.  Both our hostess and server were friendly and had good recommendations.

reviews.title: Stylish and interesting bar
text: This bar and distillery has been beautifully converted and the interior is stylish and comfortable. A great place to visit when at the Distillery District.

reviews.title: Great bar
text: This is a superb distillery making gin,vodka and whisky. It is a very stylish bar with full visual of the kilns making the spirits. We tried both the gin and whisky and bought the whisky in duty free at the airport

reviews.title: Worth a visit
text: Amazing service and cool spot with a good selection of beverages
When visiting the distillery area this venue is a good inclusion

reviews.title: Make Your Own Gin Experience
text: Highly recommend the make your own gin experience!  I love gin, but even my husband who doesn't prefer gin enjoyed this experience.  Leah and Steve were so knowledgeable and fun! We learned so much about what goes into making gin, fun facts about gin, their unique 64 time distilling process and then got to craft our own gin to our own tastes. We also really enjoyed the food we ordered. Looking forward to enjoying our gin at home - the Gin-tastic x 64 Stripper and the Gin Stripper, and coming back for more experiences at Spirit of York!

reviews.title: Mediocre and expensive - I don't recommend
text: I ate there with a friend and I was so unimpressed. The food was mediocre and the cocktails were not that good. The service is where they really lacked though - our server was basically nowhere to be found for the entirety of our meal. When we did happen to see her, we were met with disappointing responses.
I don't recommend here - there are much better options in the area.

reviews.title: Best distillery in toronto!
text: This was hands down one of the highlights of my trip to Toronto. This is an adorable aesthetic that fits in perfectly to the historic district. their tastings were so good, and fairly priced. we tried their Sicilian flatbread which was to die for. our server was kind and informative.

reviews.title: Great tour, delicious cocktails
text: My company enjoyed an informative and entertaining tour at the Spirit of York. Our guide Steve did an excellent job of mixing history of the industry from a local perspective, technical bits about distilling, and fun facts. I’ve been on quite a few brewery and vineyard tours, and this was a high quality tour while being accessible to folks who aren’t knowledgeable about the process. We all appreciated his approach to tastings, where he gave some background on the spirits but let us talk about what we tasted rather than “give away” the tasting notes. I appreciated this, as it sparked good group conversation.
Highly recommend the tour for a work/team activity! Of course, it’d be great for fun/friends/couples too!
If you’re looking for cocktails and snacks, they also have these at the Spirit of York! We all had a cocktail before we started the tour, which was appreciated.
Not sure if they rent the space out for special events, but it really is a beautiful space and a rehearsal dinner, party, etc would be lovely.

reviews.title: Amazing Tour and Tasting
text: Visited for a Tour and Tasting led by distiller Steve, who was very informative, funny, and friendly! Other staff were also incredibly accommodating, which made for a lovely experience overall. Not to mention the actual drinks we got to try, which were all immaculate in their own right. Would absolutely recommend!!

reviews.title: Hello? Can anybody see me?
text: The cocktails were good if you can get them. The service was the worst! We watched several tables of people leave after they were seated because no one came to get their orders. We had to flag someone down and pretty much had to go get our food when we saw it appear at the bar.  Lots of staff cleaning glasses, standing behind the bar, on their phones, and not making eye contact with customers. No one approaching tables. The host kept seating people but never made eye contact again. No way to get a second drink. Probably could have left without paying but we did go to the bar to pay. Didn’t leave a tip since no one served us. Pretty uncomfortable atmosphere. So weird!

reviews.title: Excellent liquor, amazing location, even better service
text: The Aquavit & Hawthorn Berry Gin were absolutely amazing, as was the service. I love the location in the beautiful distillery district, and the staff was very friendly, even allowing a sample taste of their ginger syrup. 10/10 I highly recommend visiting this location. Nothing like it back in Michigan that we've seen.

reviews.title: Fantastic whiskey
text: Stopped in for a drink while visiting the Distillery District.  The whiskey is fantastic.  The atmosphere is awesome.  It was definitely a highlight of the Distillery District.

reviews.title: Easily one of the highlights of my Toronto trip
text: Came to Toronto on vacation and decided to check out the Spirit of York - we don’t exactly have a ton of distilleries back home, and it seemed an appropriate thing to do in the Distillery District. What a great decision that was. The spirits (especially the gin, which is my go-to) were exceptional, and it was cool to hear about the distilling process and see the actual process occurring around you in the tasting room. My only regrets are that I didn’t schedule a tour, and that I didn’t have room in my suitcase to take a bottle or three back. Will definitely return next time I’m in Toronto.

reviews.title: Welshies on tour
text: Came here whilst on holiday with friends. Had one of the best days. Cocktails were amazing and Jez the owner was hilarious. Very friendly and knowledgable he even gave us a tour (which is highly recommended). A must visit when in Toronto

reviews.title: #welshlooniesontour#
text: Had a wonderful afternoon tasting the vodka and gin . The owner Jerry was really friendly and informative and made us most welcome . Beautiful decor would highly recommend .

reviews.title: Sunday drinks
text: This is my first visit to Toronto and as a lover of gin I’d looked online for any gin bars/ distillery to visit. The building is stunning set in the lovely distillery district. Inside the distillery itself is visible behind glass all around the bar area. There are displays with information about the process they use. Really lovely inside. The bar is circular with botanical decoration.

Unfortunately they only have 2 gins , which I was disappointed with. I had the dry gin with elderflower tonic. Sorry to say it was very bland and I didn’t enjoy it at all. Service wasn’t great either.
Such a shame I was really looking forward to visiting this place. I’ve only given it a 2 star rating because I liked the decor so much.

reviews.title: Great drinks and a beautiful building
text: My husband and friends came her after waking around the District and are so happy we ended up here. The craft cocktails were all delicious and several in the group purchased bottles of liquor to take home and recreate the drinks. Also, the bar itself is covered in an amazing hanging garden and it’s worth seeing. Very unique.

reviews.title: The only distiller in the Distillery District
text: Just a beautiful spot! Kudos to team for the stunning design incorporating all the old brick and old feel of this historic area.
I loved that you can try samples as well as cocktails (paid) made from the different spirits, while you can see where they have been made.
Can we also talk about the gorgeous barware for sale? Definite glass eye candy!
A must visit for the cocktail lover!

reviews.title: Great location. Even better product.
text: If you are looking for things to do in Toronto and want to do something truly original, please visit the Spirit of York Distillery. Great location and a unique product which can only be found in Ontario.

reviews.title: Can't wait to go back ...
text: Saw this place on a map of the Distillery District and had to stop.  It was a weeknight, so not very busy ... young lady behind the bar took very, very good care of us.  We did a three gin tasting, bought a bottle of gin, and my wife had a drink while we were there and we walked out for around $50 US.  The bar set-up with all the plants and the lighting is really something to see, especially in the dead of winter.  Can't wait to go back ...

reviews.title: The best distillery experience I’ve ever had
text: I cannot say enough good things about Spirit of York. From the owner to the mixologists to the venue, everything about this place is perfect. Myself and 2 friends came in for a tasting and were treated to incredible service. Everyone is so friendly and you come in feeling like you’ve been there before. Highly recommend for folks with an hour or two to spare and a desire to have some delicious spirits.

reviews.title: Best visit!
text: Came in for the tasting flight during the Christmas market and everything was so good! The space is stunning and the staff were lovely and very accommodating. I highly recommend the Hawthorn Berry Gin!

reviews.title: Great Date Place
text: We spent an hour learning about and trying different spirits! We walked away with a bottle too! Thanks!

reviews.title: Nice bar
text: Very nice to try the spirit made in this very destillery. Many drinks to choose from. Cosy atmosphere.

reviews.title: Best cocktails in town
text: Spirits of York is a small distillery located in the trendy distillery district. You can visit the distillery, do a tasting of their own produced spirits (10 CAD for 3 tasting glasses) or enjoy one of their excellent cocktails in the bar. The designs of their bottles are beautiful and perfect as souvenir or gift. Very friendly people.

reviews.title: Try the aquavit!
text: This is an interesting space in a historic building.  They offer a great selection of moderately priced cocktails as well as the opportunity to sample 3 of their distilled spirits for $10.  They make 4 spirits--aquavit, gin, whiskey, and vodka.  Aquavit was one of the first distilled spirits.  It's similar to gin, but without the juniper.

reviews.title: Great Distillery and Tasting Bar
text: In the gentrified Distillery District this is a working distillery producing gin, vodkas and rye whisky. It's beautufully set up with a round bar in the middle and clear views into the distillery behind. You can have a tasting tray of 3 spirits for $10, that they talk you through. Although you can have all sorts of cocktails. Well worth dropping in if you're in the neighbourhood.

reviews.title: Beautiful place to visit in the Distillery distirct of Toronto
text: Such an awesome place to visit. Great tour of the facilities , friendly staff and excellent cocktails .  Wish I lived in,  Toronto great venue for a party

reviews.title: Drinks and an amazing time
text: This place is amazing! The drinks are fantastic! The environment is so chill and the staff are excellent!
My hats off to Danny for her service and recommendation!

reviews.title: I found a Gem in Toronto
text: Exceptional venue. Lots of room for events. Staff friendly and fun. Vodka and Gin. Soooooooo good :) great tasting, and mixed drinks to be had. Location good for a memorable visit to the neighborhood.

reviews.title: A nice Distillery in the Distillery District worth visiting
text: I like the Distillery District. It's a fascinating area of old Toronto. So naturally, while visiting I had to visit a distillery.

Spirit of York is a newer business but they had a nice set up. They offered guided tours but also you could do a self-guided tour as well. when done, they offered free samples of their various products and the prices were reasonable. I ended up buying a few bottles as gifts for people I will be visiting while on holiday in Toronto

reviews.title: Incredible!!!
text: What an absolute gem!
Amazing drinks from an in-house distillery, staff that go above and beyond to ensure your experience is memorable. Great little menu and a nice Sunday brunch.
Try it and see for yourself!

reviews.title: Great service and product!
text: Took part in the Master Whisky Class. Phil provided an entertaining and informative tour and explanation of the process along with some history and stories. His passion for his craft is evident. The cocktail that started the class was delicious and the distillery's own whisky was excellent. It was a fantastic way to spend the evening!

reviews.title: Amazing Visit
text: I visited the Spirit of York for a Tour and Tasting in Aug 2022 and had a thoroughly great time! Many thanks for the manager Danielle for squeezing me in and huge thanks to Phil for such a detailed and fun tour.
I found the tour really interesting and its so clear how much thought and consideration goes into making the products.

Plus, some of the smoothest vodka / gin I have had in a long time - typically I would steer toward a aged rum or bourbon, but the quality of this spirit made me starting thinking about what I can do with vodka and gin again.
Great experience, would recommend.

reviews.title: Amazing Distillery
text: We had an amazing time visiting this Distillery. The spirits here were all so delicious and I wish we had enough luggage space to take a bunch home with us! It is located in the very beautiful Distillery Historic District, so very fitting. Definitely recommend checking this place out! The decor and the seating areas are absolutely gorgeous too.

reviews.title: Awesome for spring break
text: Amazing spot for young people starting off their day! Staff is so awesome and gives great advice on where to go for the night! Gin is top notch! A MUST when in toronto!

reviews.title: Nice Distillery!
text: Awesome ambiance!  Great staff.  Great mixed drinks.  Great location!  They have vodka, gin and a rye....It was good.  Not really my cup of tea (I am more of a bourbon guy).  But still great place to stop in and try their spirits!

reviews.title: Amazing Service and Great Drinks!
text: The Distillery District houses this amazing place.  Upon entering Spirit of York, you find excellent customer service, great drinks, and amazing ambiance.  It is one of the best distilleries that I have experienced, where the entire place is worth visiting and enjoying a drink at least.  We were able to enjoy a cosmo and moscow mule, and both were truly amazing.  I would definitely recommend coming during the day to relax and enjoy not only the snacks, but drinks as well.  Worth visiting!

reviews.title: Incredible Place. A must try.
text: The bartenders are incredibly fun to talk to and are extremely passionate and knowledgable about their spirits and their creations. Hands down the best alcohol I have ever tasted, and the prices are extremely reasonable. You can taste the care and craftsmanship that they put into every bottle. Danni, the outstanding bartender who served me and my family, just added to the overall experience. I will definitely be going back soon, and so should you!

reviews.title: Great folks, great cocktail
text: My wife and I were on a two-day stay in Toronto as part of a Canadian/Hockey road trip as a birthday celebration get-away, and we stopped in for a cocktail.  The drinks were great, but when we realized that two of the bartenders also were January birthdays, we bonded over our cake choice preferences, and they started offering suggestions on other must-see destinations in Toronto.  Great spirits served by great spirits in great spirit!  Will definitely be back whenever I may get back to Toronto!
